mapper.select: SELECT d.id ,d.oid ,d.pid ,d.qty ,d.price ,d.status ,d.startdate ,d.enddate ,d.days ,d.status ,p.title FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON d.pid = p.id WHERE d.oid = #{oid}
SELECT * FROM ordered WHERE aid = #{aid} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordered(id, aid, receiver, address, paytype, total, pdate, ddate, edate) VALUES(ordered_seq.NEXTVAL, #{aid}, #{receiver}, #{address}, #{paytype}, #{total}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{ddate}, #{edate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT* FROM ORDERED ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND aid = #{aid} AND pdate = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
